description: Jordan Evans has his gun cocked and loaded, and he's ready to shoot it off! Hailing from the Pacific Northwest, this versatile performer makes his introduction in a fired up segment, as he strips out of his dress uniform and lets loose in the locker room. Cleaning his gun carefully, he wipes the barrel and makes sure the chamber is well oiled, before shifting his attention to the pistol between his legs, which also gets a healthy application of oil. Stroking his barrel as he spreads his legs, Jordan is primed and ready to let his rounds fly, and so he leans back, emptying the chamber and firing his load all over himself in a sticky hot mess that definitely hits the mark.</br></br>Enjoy!
title: Jordan Evans
